responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "6EC02D174098953413D2F48D0B51DB64", "I agree, this is much more significant than just goblins attacking people in the woods. Everything you\'ve uncovered points to a much larger operation. But what exactly is it? They probably have a conclave operating somewhere in the Riverlands, likely not too far from Carphin. Spreading their resources too thin would be impractical. However, they might be hiding their activities to avoid suspicion. It\'s up to you to uncover the truth. I\'m sorry I can\'t assist more, but I appreciate your understanding.")
name: DD_CSQ_0071_Farzaan_86
